name: パンチアウト!!
summary: Punch-Out!! (パンチアウト!!) is a 1984 boxing arcade game by Nintendo.It was the first in a series of successful Punch-Out!! games that produced an arcade sequel known as Super Punch-Out!!, a spin-off of the series titled Arm Wrestling, a highly popular version for the NES originally known as Mike Tyson's Punch-Out!!, and Super Punch-Out!! for the SNES.

  • 平台: Arcade
  • 平台: Game & Watch

  • 游玩人数: 1人
  • 发行日期: 1984年4月
